name: tree-sitter-rstml
description: Rust + html grammar for the tree-sitter parser library.
author: Ryan Halliwell <git@rayliwell.com>

scripts.build: ./scripts/import-scanners && ./scripts/create-queries && npm run build-rstml && npm run build-rust-with-rstml
scripts.test: npm run test-rstml && npm run test-rust-with-rstml && npm run test-bindings
scripts.playground-rstml: npm run build-rstml && npm run build-wasm-rstml && cd rstml && tree-sitter playground
scripts.playground-rust-with-rstml: npm run build-rust-with-rstml && npm run build-wasm-rust-with-rstml && cd rust_with_rstml && tree-sitter playground
